name: xmms.vim
description:
This script maps xmms control functions to the following functionkeys:

F6        Decrease volume by 5%
F7        Increase volume by 5%
F8        Show title of currently playing song
F9        Open XMMS
S-F9    Close XMMS
F10      Start playing
S-F10  Stop playing
F11      Pause playing
S-F11  Toggle shuffle
F12      Play next
S-F12  Play previous
install_details:
Make sure you have installed xmmsctrl, if not it is available from this URL: http://user.it.uu.se/~adavid/utils.

Unpack the archive and install the file xmms.vim into your plugins folder.
The file xmms.sxw is an OpenOffice swriter file that contains a form that shows the standard keymap, print it to attach it above your functions keys.
